metadata.name: Sensitive File Access Via Volume Shadow Copy Backup
metadata.comment: Detects a command that accesses the VolumeShadowCopy in order to extract sensitive files such as the Security or SAM registry hives or the AD database (ntds.dit)

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (activity_id = 1 AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('\\\\?\\\\globalroot\\\\device\\\\harddiskvolumeshadowcopy')) AND (contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('\\\\ntds.dit')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('\\\\system')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('\\\\security'))))

output.summary: Detects a command that accesses the VolumeShadowCopy in order to extract sensitive files such as the Security or SAM registry hives or the AD database (ntds.dit)
